definitions.body: pour, pour out, oil, in anointing, sq. acc. ([[שׁמן]]) + [[על]] Ge 28:18 (E), Ge 35:14 (J); sq. [[מִשֶּׁמֶן]] + [[לְ]] Le 8:12 (P); sq. [[על]] ([[שׁמן]] implied from context) Ex 29:7 (P), 1Sa 10:1, 2Ki 9:3; sq. [[שֶׁמֶן]] + [[אֶל־]] v:2Ki 9:6; fig., c. [[רוּחִי]] + [[על]] Is 44:3; oil in sacrifice, + [[על]] Le 2:1, Le 2:6, Nu 5:15; in cleansing, + [[על]] Le 14:15, Le 14:26 (upon his plam; all P); oil into ([[על]]) vessels 2Ki 4:4; water, for washing, + [[על]] 2Ki 3:11; for drenching, + [[על]] 1Ki 18:34; for boiling (into ([[בְּ]]) the caldron), symbol., Ez Eze 24:3, Ez Eze 24:3; for satisfying thirst (fig.) + [[על]] Is 44:3; blood (of sacrifice) + [[אֶל־יְסוֹד]] Le 8:15, Le 9:9 (P); pottage, for eating, 2Ki 4:40, 2Ki 4:41; cakes ([[לְבִבוֹת]]) 2Sa 13:9; fig. of disease [[יׇחוּק בּוֹ]] Ps 41:9 infused into him (al. less prob. as

intrans. flow, pour, only [[וַיִּחֶק]] 1Ki 22:35 (of blood), Job 38:38 [[בְּחֶקֶת]] [[עָפָר לַמּוּחָק]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיַּצִּ֫קוּ]] 2Sa 15:24; [[וַיַּצִּקֻם]] Jos 7:23; Pt. f. [[מי֠חָָקֶת]] 2Ki 4:5; —pour (oil) 2Ki 4:5, fig. of shekels of silver, etc., pour out Jos 7:23; of the ark, 2Sa 15:24 set down (?); but read [[וַיַצִּיגוּ]] (Dr Gr).
be poured, subj. [[שֶׁמֶן]] sq. [[לְ]] (in anointing), Le 21:10 (H); fig. of foundation of wicked Job 22:16, v. Di; of grace [[חֵן]] on lips, Ps 45:3 (sq. [[ב]]), v. Che.
Pt. = cast, molten ´[[הים המ]] 1Ki 7:23 = 2Ch 4:2; as predicate 1Ki 7:33; cstr. as subst. [[מֻצַּק נְחשֶׁת]] 1Ki 7:16.
Pt., fig. firmly established, pred. of pers., ´[[וְהָיִיתָ מ]] Job 11:15 and thou shalt be established (‖[[לאׁ תִירָא]]).
